resources.string: 361_menu
Hatofu Boyfriend(Logo)
NEW STORY
START
EXIT
Hurry Up!
Calm down.
Protagonist: "Wait, let me write the lab plan a little more... It's almost done, can you please stop rushing me? I've forgotten!
Scene 1: Lab Room, 5:55 PM

The three of them are in the university lab room as the sky outside begins to darken. The fluorescent lights flicker slightly. Tae and the protagonist are working while Pued stands by, offering distant moral support.
Tea: "Oh my god, why is this so difficult? I don't want to do it anymore. Let's go, man. I can't do it anymore."
Protagonist: "Wait, let me write the lab plan a little more... It's almost done, can you please stop rushing me? I've forgotten!"
Protagonist: "Hmm... *Erebus odora*, a large moth with skull-like patterns. Why did Professor Songsit ask us to study this? I really wonder."
Tae: "It’s almost six already. They’re going to lock the building soon!"
Pued: Smiling coldly, "If you get stuck in the building, you’ll be in trouble. Especially with all the strange rumors about this place lately..."
Protagonist: "Alright, just a moment! Give me two more minutes."
Protagonist: "Ugh... This *Erebus odora*, a large moth with skull-like patterns—why did Professor Songsit make us study this? It’s so damn difficult!"
Scene 3: Encountering the Guard for the First Time

A faint knocking sound comes from the door before the guard appears from the shadowy corridor behind it. Suddenly, there are faint footsteps from the hallway outside the lab, but the three pay no attention.
Guard: "Hey kids, why are you still here? It’s late, you know. I need to lock the doors before I go home."
Tae: "Oh, we got caught up with the lab work. We’re about to leave, sir."

Guard: Smiling slyly, "There have been strange reports in this building recently. Let me warn you—if you hear anything odd, *don’t look back*. And under no circumstances should you go to the back door right now."
Protagonist: Looking surprised, "Thanks for the warning, sir!"
Tae: "Hey, Protagonist, we should leave now. They’re going to close the building soon!"
Pued: "The guard just warned us, man. Let’s not push it."
Protagonist: "Just a little more! I’m almost done. Let me wrap this up quickly."
Scene 4: Lab Blackout
Tae: "Oh no, Protagonist! Look, the lights are out. They must be about to lock the building. Let’s hurry and get out of here."
Protagonist: Anxiously, "Damn it! I didn’t save my work. Forget it, let’s go. Which way do you think we should leave?"
Pued: "Why don’t we check the front door first?"
Tae: With a panicked expression, "I think the front door’s a good idea, but if it’s locked, we can check the back door."
Protagonist: Hesitating slightly, "Alright, let’s check the front door first..."
Scene 5: At the Door
Scene 6: Spotting a Sign on the Desk - *Be Right Back: Bathroom*
Tae: "Where the hell did the guard go?"
Tae: "What do we do, Protagonist? Should we look for the guard or check the back door?"
Go to the bathroom
Check the back door
Protagonist: "I think we should go to the bathroom first. The guard mentioned he might be there."
Tae: "Do you smell something weird? It smells like... water..."
Protagonist: "Oh no! And that... That red liquid—it’s blood!"
Pued: "Don’t touch it if you don’t want trouble..."
Scene 7: The Eerie Bathroom
Investigate the bathroom
Don’t investigate
Protagonist: "What the hell is this? I feel like throwing up."
Tae: "Oh, come on... Oh, I mean, you’d better wash your hands immediately!"
Pued: "I told you not to touch it! Damn it, I knew something strange was going on."
Protagonist: "Forget it. Let’s just keep it together and get out of here..."
Scene 9: The Strange Cat
As they leave the bathroom, a thin, bony cat emerges from the corner. It stares at them with an unsettling gaze.
Scene 11: The Silent Corridor
Pued: "The guard wasn’t in the bathroom. Let’s head back to the front door."
Protagonist: "You lead the way. I don’t want to go first."
Tae: "But I don’t know the way either... Well, let’s figure it out."
Scene 12: The Wrong Path
Tae: "Damn it! Did you hear that sound? It’s like something’s following us!"
Protagonist: "Shh... It sounds like footsteps..."
Pued: "Oh no, we took the wrong way! We’re heading toward the back door!"
Scene 13: Encounter with the Muscle Man
Suddenly, Brother To appears at the end of the hallway, his piercing gaze fixed on them.
Brother To: "Oh... Still here, kids? How about joining me for a little testosterone release, young boy?"
Tae: "Guys, run!!"
Scene 14: Chaos and Panic
They try to escape, but there’s no outrunning Brother To’s superior calves. Everyone scrambles to find a way out as he moves closer.
Hide behind a friend
Hide behind Pued
Hide behind Tae
Tae: "We’re out of options! Do we have anything to fight him with?"
Protagonist: "Yeah, we don’t have a choice. I’ve got something we can use."
Protagonist: "You!" *kicks*
Pued: "No! Aaaaah!!!"
Brother To: "Oh, come on now. Don’t run from my embrace, boy."
Protagonist: "Damn it! I’ve got to do something!"
Use an item
Don’t use an item
Protagonist: *Transforms into Hentai Kamen!*
Brother To: "That’s... Hentai Boy! Oh no, does this mean I have to give up my masculinity now, boy?"
Scene 16: Searching for the Guard
After an exhausting battle, they manage to temporarily escape Brother To. The group heads off to find the guard in hopes of getting the exit key.
Protagonist: "We have no choice, Tae. We need to find... the guard’s key."
Tae: "Got it! Let’s get to the front door quickly. We need to get out of here!"
Tae: "Let’s check the guard’s desk. Maybe we’ll find something useful."
Scene 17: Still Searching for the Guard
Protagonist: "Damn it. We don’t have the key. How are we supposed to get out now?"
Tae: "Yeah... We need to get out... but there’s something you need to know first."
Protagonist: *looks at Tae in confusion* "What now? Don’t get all mysterious on me, Tae. Let’s just go already!"
Scene 18: Suddenly, Tae reveals the key to the protagonist and slowly moves closer to him.
Tae: "Protagonist... I’m sorry, but I don’t think you’ll be leaving this place."
Protagonist: *shocked* "What?! What are you saying, Tae? We’re friends, aren’t we?!"
Tae: *chuckles softly* "Friends... Yes, I thought we’d always be friends. But not anymore."
Scene 19: Tae’s Sinister Smile
Tae: "You just don’t understand. I’m doing this... because I love you, Protagonist."
Protagonist: *stunned* "What? What do you mean?"
Tae: "I think you’re going to fall madly in love with me too, aren’t you?"
Protagonist: "Don’t tell me!"
Tae: "I am the *Boss of Gay*, and I can’t let you leave this place. I want you to stay here... with me... forever."
Tae: "If you want to leave, you’ll have to make a choice."
Surrender
Refuse
Protagonist: *pauses in silence* "I... I don’t have a choice, do I?"
Protagonist: "Alright... fine. Just... take it slow."
Tae: "Mmm... I’ll make sure you’ll never forget me. We’ll be together until the end of time. No one will ever take you away from me."
Protagonist: *sighs* "I guess it’s happening again."
Protagonist: *sighs* "I guess it’s happening again."
